Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.3 Ganthasampayuttaduka » 5.3.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.3.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
101.
1839Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava…pe…  nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye nava…pe…  namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
